IN GENERAL, WE ONLY USE YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION IN THE MANNER DESCRIBED IN THE PRIVACY NOTICE IN EFFECT WHEN WE RECEIVED THAT PERSONAL INFORMATION.YOUR
This "automatically collected" information may include Internet Protocol address ("IP Address"), a unique device or user ID, version of software installed, system type, the referring search query used to locate content and pages on the SlidesClicker Platform, the content and pages that you access on the SlidesClicker Platform, the dates and times that you visit the SlidesClicker Software, the amount of usage of SlidesClicker platform etc.
When you access the SlidesClicker Platform or open one of our HTML emails, we may automatically record certain information from your system by using different types of tracking technology.
You may also provide other information to SlidesClicker Software, including your age, location, and gender, through use of other functionality and features.
- SlidesClicker may disclose aggregated or other types of non-personally identifiable information to third parties for various purposes, including marketing or promotional uses.

data_type: amount of usage of slidesclicker platform
text:
This "automatically collected" information may include Internet Protocol address ("IP Address"), a unique device or user ID, version of software installed, system type, the referring search query used to locate content and pages on the SlidesClicker Platform, the content and pages that you access on the SlidesClicker Platform, the dates and times that you visit the SlidesClicker Software, the amount of usage of SlidesClicker platform etc.
When you access the SlidesClicker Platform or open one of our HTML emails, we may automatically record certain information from your system by using different types of tracking technology.

- SlidesClicker may use "Automatically Collected" information and "Cookies" information to: (a) automatically update the SlidesClicker application on your system; (b) remember your information so that you will not have to re-enter it during your visit or the next time you access the SlidesClicker Platform; (c) monitor aggregate site usage metrics such as total number of visitors and pages accessed; (d) provide such metrics to Users as they pertain to such User's uploaded content; and (e) track your entries, submissions, and status in any promotions or other activities.

SlidesClicker may use both session cookies and persistent cookies.
